title: Most toxic and trolling player in OCE
body:
[REMOVED] ----------  [REMOVED]

 In a rank game, also my promotion game to gold, in my team, i was filled to mid,and other player:'' **[REMOVED]** '' filled to supp. He tried to ask me to give him mid, but i can't supp, so i said no, and his duo, ''**[REMOVED]**'' tell me to go adc, but i don't want to go adc, because my first choice is mid, so i reject it as well. After that,'' **[REMOVED]**'' chose [CHAMP], and bring smite,''**[REMOVED]** ''chose [CHAMP]  as supp. But when we are choosing our champ, he keep framing me, and said some bad things, i don't mind a player say something bad to me, but into the game, [CHAMP] left our adc, came to steal mid cs, and keep trolling, this behaviour is unacceptable, enemy got a free win after this game, and in the game, he keep blaming us doing bad, idk is his mum dead or what, i have never seen this kind of toxic kid, really disgusting about game feeling. 

This is rank game, not his home, he auto filled to supp, i filed to mid, it is my fault? toxic and trolling for can't steal my mid lane, because of this reason, this duo troll 3 of us. I have check his OP.gg, he is plat 5, a plat 5 player is so toxic and behave so bad, what a shame.

___

[No Reporting Other Players - https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/BjArMH2B-boards-universal-rules]

replies.body: Ye I seen these guys if they dont get there way they will troll you there very cringe worthy
